languages.text: Судьба Паскаля Ханейманна, сопровождавшего Вольного Торговца в походе на Эпитафию, окутана загадкой. Он был признан усопшим, и его идентификатор был добавлен в поминальную свод-молитву. Но ходили слухи о загадочном пленнике станции Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17. Якобы когда-то он был техножрецом, но стал свидетелем ужасных событий и был искалечен телесно и духовно. Умирающего, его отыскала экспедиция Эксплораторов. Знания, хранившиеся в его нейроаугменте, были слишком ценны, чтобы избавиться от них, но слишком опасны, чтобы даровать ему свободу, потому таинственный "узник Фурибундуса" десятилетия служил основой для смущающих разум баек.

The fate of Pasqal Haneumann, who accompanied the Rogue Trader in {mf|his|her} campaign on Epitaph, is shrouded in mystery. He was pronounced dead and his identifier was added to a memorial code-prayer. Yet, there were rumours of a mysterious prisoner on the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Some say he had once been a Tech-Priest but was crippled spiritually and physically after witnessing unspeakable events. An Explorator expedition had found him on the brink of death. The knowledge stored in his neural augmetic was too valuable to simply dispose of but too dangerous for him to be granted freedom. And thus, the mysterious "Prisoner of Furibundus" became the subject of tall tales for decades.
languages.original_text: Судьба Паскаля Ханейманна, сопровождавшего Вольного Торговца в походе на Эпитафию, окутана загадкой. traits.locale_text: The fate of Pasqal Haneumann, who accompanied the Rogue Trader in his march on Epitaph, is shrouded in mystery. He was pronounced dead, and his identifier was added to a memorial code-prayer. Yet, as rumour had it, a mysterious prisoner appeared on an Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 station. Some say that he was a Tech-Priest once, but after witnessing some unspeakable events was crippled spiritually and physically. An Explorator expedition found him on a death's door. The knowledge stored in his neural augmetic was too valuable to get rid of, but too dangerous to grant him freedom. And thus, the mysterious prisoner of Furibundus for decades became a base for perplexing tales.

The fate of Pasqal Haneumann, who accompanied the Rogue Trader in his march on Epitaph, is shrouded in mystery. He was pronounced dead, and his identifier was added to a memorial code-prayer. Some say that he was a Tech-Priest once, but after witnessing some unspeakable events was crippled spiritually and physically. An Explorator expedition found him on a death's door. The knowledge stored in his neural augmetic was too valuable to get rid of, but too dangerous to grant him freedom. And thus, the mysterious prisoner of Furibundus for decades became a base for perplexing tales.

languages.text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼陪同行商浪人前往荒垄碑碣，他的命运至今未知。他被宣布已正式死亡，身份识别码被添加到纪念代码祷告中。然而，有传言称，卡利西斯祭坛17号有一位神秘的囚犯。有人说他曾经是一名技术神甫，但在目睹了无法言喻的事件后，他的精神和身体都瘫痪了。开拓者舰队是在某场探险中发现他的，那时他已濒临死亡，但由于储存在他神经植入物的知识极具价值，不能被简单处理掉，于是救了他一命。然而，他脑中的知识过于危险，不能将他释放。数十年来，这位神秘的“怒焰星囚徒”一直都是荒诞故事的热门主角。
languages.original_text: The fate of Pasqal Haneumann, who accompanied the Rogue Trader in {mf|his|her} campaign on Epitaph, is shrouded in mystery. The knowledge stored in his neural augmetic was too valuable to simply dispose of but too dangerous for him to be granted freedom. And thus, the mysterious "Prisoner of Furibundus" became the subject of tall tales for decades.

traits.locale_text: 帕斯卡尔·哈努曼陪同行商浪人前往荒垄碑碣，他的命运至今未知。他被宣布已正式死亡，身份识别码被添加到纪念代码祷告中。然而，有传言称，卡利西斯祭坛17号有一位神秘的囚犯。有人说他曾经是一名技术祭司，但在目睹了无法言喻的事件后，他的精神和身体都瘫痪了。开拓者舰队是在某场探险中发现他的，那时他已濒临死亡，但由于储存在他神经植入物的知识极具价值，不能被简单处理掉，于是救了他一命。然而，他脑中的知识过于危险，不能将他释放。数十年来，这位神秘的“怒焰星囚徒”一直都是荒诞故事的热门主角。

帕斯卡·哈努曼陪同行商浪人前往荒垄碑碣，他的命运至今未知。他被宣布已正式死亡，身份识别码被添加到纪念代码祷告中。然而，有传言称，卡利西斯祭坛17号有一位神秘的囚犯。有人说他曾经是一名技术神甫，但在目睹了无法言喻的事件后，他的精神和身体都瘫痪了。开拓者舰队是在某场探险中发现他的，那时他已濒临死亡，但由于储存在他神经植入物的知识极具价值，不能被简单处理掉，于是救了他一命。然而，他脑中的知识过于危险，不能将他释放。数十年来，这位神秘的“怒焰星囚徒”一直都是荒诞故事的热门主角。

languages.text: Niemand weiß, was aus Pasqal Haneumann geworden ist, der {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beim Feldzug gegen Epitaph begleitete. Er wurde für tot erklärt und seine ID wurde in ein Gedenk-Codegebet integriert. Es gibt aber Gerüchte von einem mysteriösen Gefangenen auf der Station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Manche sagen, er sei einst ein Techpriester gewesen, dann aber seelisch wie körperlich verkrüppelt worden, nachdem er unaussprechliche Ereignisse miterlebt hatte. Eine Explorator-Expedition hatte ihn halbtot vorgefunden. Das Wissen in seinen neuralen Augmentationen war zu wertvoll, um es einfach zu entsorgen, aber zu gefährlich, um ihm die Freiheit zu schenken. Und so wurde der mysteriöse "Gefangene von Furibundus" über Jahrzehnte hinweg Gegenstand von wilden Geschichten.
languages.original_text: The fate of Pasqal Haneumann, who accompanied the Rogue Trader in {mf|his|her} campaign on Epitaph, is shrouded in mystery. He was pronounced dead and his identifier was added to a memorial code-prayer. Yet, there were rumours of a mysterious prisoner on the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. The knowledge stored in his neural augmetic was too valuable to simply dispose of but too dangerous for him to be granted freedom. traits.locale_text: Niemand weiß, was aus Pasqal Haneumann geworden ist, der {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beim Marsch auf Epitaph begleitete. Er wurde für tot erklärt und seine ID wurde in ein Gedenk-Codegebet integriert. Es gibt aber Gerüchte von einem mysteriösen Gefangenen auf der Station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Manche sagen, er sei einst ein Techpriester gewesen, dann aber seelisch wie körperlich verkrüppelt worden, nachdem er unaussprechliche Ereignisse miterlebt hatte. Eine Explorator-Expedition hatte ihn gefunden, schon fast tot. Das Wissen in seinen neuralen Augmentationen war zu wertvoll, um es einfach zu entsorgen, aber zu gefährlich, um ihm die Freiheit zu schenken. Und so wurde der mysteriöse "Gefangene von Furibundus" über Jahrzehnte hinweg Gegenstand von wilden Geschichten.

Niemand weiß, was aus Pasqal Haneumann geworden ist, der {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} beim Feldzug gegen Epitaph begleitete. Er wurde für tot erklärt und seine ID wurde in ein Gedenk-Codegebet integriert. Es gibt aber Gerüchte von einem mysteriösen Gefangenen auf der Station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Manche sagen, er sei einst ein Techpriester gewesen, dann aber seelisch wie körperlich verkrüppelt worden, nachdem er unaussprechliche Ereignisse miterlebt hatte. Eine Explorator-Expedition hatte ihn halbtot vorgefunden. Das Wissen in seinen neuralen Augmentationen war zu wertvoll, um es einfach zu entsorgen, aber zu gefährlich, um ihm die Freiheit zu schenken. Und so wurde der mysteriöse "Gefangene von Furibundus" über Jahrzehnte hinweg Gegenstand von wilden Geschichten.

languages.text: Le sort de Pasqal Haneumann, qui accompagna {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} lors de sa campagne sur Épitaphe, est drapé de mystère. Il fut déclaré mort et on ajouta son identifiant à une prière commémorative. Toutefois, des rumeurs parlaient d'un mystérieux prisonnier à la station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Certains disaient qu'il s'agissait d'un ancien technoprêtre qui avait été mutilé spirituellement et physiquement après avoir été témoin d'événements abominables. Une expédition d'Explorators l'avait retrouvé à l'article de la mort. Ils ne pouvaient pas l'éliminer du fait des précieuses connaissances stockées dans son augmétique neuronal, mais celles-ci étaient aussi trop dangereuses pour permettre à Pasqal de rester en liberté. Ainsi, le mystérieux « prisonnier de Furibundus » fit l'objet d'histoires à dormir debout pendant des décennies.
languages.original_text: The fate of Pasqal Haneumann, who accompanied the Rogue Trader in {mf|his|her} campaign on Epitaph, is shrouded in mystery. He was pronounced dead and his identifier was added to a memorial code-prayer. Yet, there were rumours of a mysterious prisoner on the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Some say he had once been a Tech-Priest but was crippled spiritually and physically after witnessing unspeakable events. An Explorator expedition had found him on the brink of death. The knowledge stored in his neural augmetic was too valuable to simply dispose of but too dangerous for him to be granted freedom. And thus, the mysterious "Prisoner of Furibundus" became the subject of tall tales for decades.

Il fut déclaré mort et on ajouta son identifiant à une prière commémorative. Toutefois, des rumeurs parlaient d'un mystérieux prisonnier à la station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Une expédition d'Explorators l'avait retrouvé à l'article de la mort. Ils ne pouvaient pas l'éliminer du fait des précieuses connaissances stockées dans son augmétique neuronal, mais celles-ci étaient aussi trop dangereuses pour permettre à Pasqal de rester en liberté. Ainsi, le mystérieux « prisonnier de Furibundus » fit l'objet d'histoires à dormir debout pendant des décennies.

languages.text: El destino de Pasqal Haneumann, que acompañó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente durante su campaña en Epitafio, está envuelto en misterio. Se declaró su muerte y su identificador se añadió a una oración codificada en recuerdo. Aun así, se hablaba de un prisionero misterioso en la estación Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Algunos dicen que antes había sido un tecnosacerdote, pero que quedó mutilado física y espiritualmente tras presenciar eventos inenarrables. Una expedición de exploradores lo encontró al borde de la muerte. El saber almacenado en su aumético neural era demasiado valioso como para deshacerse de él, pero demasiado peligroso como para otorgarle la libertad. Así, el misterioso «Prisionero de Furibundus» se convirtió en el centro de rumores y leyendas durante décadas.
languages.original_text: The fate of Pasqal Haneumann, who accompanied the Rogue Trader in {mf|his|her} campaign on Epitaph, is shrouded in mystery. He was pronounced dead and his identifier was added to a memorial code-prayer. Yet, there were rumours of a mysterious prisoner on the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Some say he had once been a Tech-Priest but was crippled spiritually and physically after witnessing unspeakable events. An Explorator expedition had found him on the brink of death. The knowledge stored in his neural augmetic was too valuable to simply dispose of but too dangerous for him to be granted freedom. And thus, the mysterious "Prisoner of Furibundus" became the subject of tall tales for decades.

traits.locale_text: El destino de Pasqal Haneumann, que acompañó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente durante su marcha a Epitafio, está envuelto en misterio. Se declaró su muerte y su identificador se añadió a una oración codificada en recuerdo. Aun así, se hablaba de un prisionero misterioso en la estación Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Algunos dicen que antes había sido un tecnosacerdote, pero que quedó mutilado física y espiritualmente tras presenciar eventos inenarrables. Una expedición de exploradores lo encontró al borde de la muerte. El saber almacenado en su aumético neural era demasiado valioso como para deshacerse de él, pero demasiado peligroso como para otorgarle la libertad. Así, el misterioso «Prisionero de Furibundus» se convirtió en el centro de rumores y leyendas durante décadas.

languages.text: 自由開拓者のエピタフへの進軍に同行したパスカル・ヘニュマンの運命は謎に包まれている。彼は死亡が確認され、識別名は追悼のコード祈祷に加えられた。しかし、ステーション・アルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17には謎の囚人がいるという噂があった。彼はかつて技術司祭であったが、言葉では言い表せない出来事を目撃したことで精神的にも肉体的にも廃人になってしまったのだという者もいる。探索隊が死の淵にある彼を発見した。彼の神経オーグメティックに蓄えられた知識は、単に処分するにはあまりに貴重なものであったが、自由を与えるにはあまりに危険なものであった。こうして、謎に包まれた「フリブンダスの囚人」は、何十年もの間、世にも奇妙な話の題材となった。
languages.original_text: The fate of Pasqal Haneumann, who accompanied the Rogue Trader in {mf|his|her} campaign on Epitaph, is shrouded in mystery. He was pronounced dead and his identifier was added to a memorial code-prayer. Yet, there were rumours of a mysterious prisoner on the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Some say he had once been a Tech-Priest but was crippled spiritually and physically after witnessing unspeakable events. An Explorator expedition had found him on the brink of death. The knowledge stored in his neural augmetic was too valuable to simply dispose of but too dangerous for him to be granted freedom. And thus, the mysterious "Prisoner of Furibundus" became the subject of tall tales for decades.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者のエピタフへの進軍に同行したパスカル・ヘニュマンの運命は謎に包まれている。彼は死亡が確認され、識別名は追悼のコード祈祷に加えられた。しかし、ステーション・アルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17には謎の囚人がいるという噂があった。彼はかつて技術司祭であったが、言葉では言い表せない出来事を目撃したことで精神的にも肉体的にも廃人になってしまったのだという者もいる。探索隊が死の淵にある彼を発見した。彼の神経オーグメティックに蓄えられた知識は、単に処分するにはあまりに貴重なものであったが、自由を与えるにはあまりに危険なものであった。こうして、謎に包まれた「フリブンダスの囚人」は、何十年もの間、世にも奇妙な話の題材となった。

自由開拓者の墓碑への進軍に同行したパスカル・ヘニュマンの運命は謎に包まれている。彼は死亡が確認され、識別名は追悼のコード祈祷に加えられた。しかし、ステーション・アルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17には謎の囚人がいるという噂があった。彼はかつて技術司祭であったが、言いようのない出来事を目撃し、精神的にも肉体的にも廃人になってしまったという者もいる。探索隊が、死の淵で彼を発見した。彼の神経オーグメティックに蓄えられた知識は、単に処分するにはあまりに貴重であったが、自由を与えるにはあまりに危険であった。こうして、謎に包まれた 「フリブンダスの囚人 」は、何十年もの間、世にも不思議な話の題材となった。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'e Sinyazıt seferinde eşlik eden Pasqal Haneumann'a ne olduğu gizemini koruyor. Öldüğü ilan edildi, kimliği de cenaze kod duasına eklendi. Ancak Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 istasyondaki gizemli bir mahkûm hakkında çeşitli söylentiler ortaya çıktı. Bazıları onun bir zamanlar Tekno Rahip olduğunu ve ağza alınmaz bazı olaylara şahitlik ettikten sonra ruhsal ve fiziksel olarak sakat kaldığını söylüyordu. Bir Keşiftör grubu, onu ölümün eşiğindeyken bulmuştu. Sinirsel ogmetiklerinde depolanmış bilgiler, bir kenara atılamayacak kadar değerli olup özgürlüğünü geri verilemeyecek kadar da tehlikeliydi. Böylece gizemli "Furibundus Mahkûmu"; on yıllarca anlatılan, abartılı hikâyelere konu oldu.
languages.original_text: The fate of Pasqal Haneumann, who accompanied the Rogue Trader in {mf|his|her} campaign on Epitaph, is shrouded in mystery. He was pronounced dead and his identifier was added to a memorial code-prayer. Yet, there were rumours of a mysterious prisoner on the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Some say he had once been a Tech-Priest but was crippled spiritually and physically after witnessing unspeakable events. An Explorator expedition had found him on the brink of death. The knowledge stored in his neural augmetic was too valuable to simply dispose of but too dangerous for him to be granted freedom. And thus, the mysterious "Prisoner of Furibundus" became the subject of tall tales for decades.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'e Kitabe seferinde eşlik eden Pasqal Haneumann'a ne olduğu gizemini koruyor. Öldüğü ilan edildi ve kimlik saptayıcısı, cenaze kod duasına eklendi. Ancak Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 istasyondaki gizemli bir mahkûm hakkında çeşitli söylentiler ortaya çıktı. Bazıları onun bir zamanlar bir Tekno Rahip olduğunu ve ağza alınmaz bazı olaylara şahitlik ettikten sonra ruhsal ve fiziksel olarak sakat kaldığını söylüyordu. Bir Keşiftör grubu onu ölümün eşiğindeyken buldu. Sinirsel ogmetiklerinde depolanmış bilgiler bir kenara atılamayacak kadar değerli, ancak ona özgürlüğünün geri verilemeyeceği kadar da tehlikeliydi. Böylece gizemli "Furibundus Mahkûmu" on yıllar boyunca anlatılan abartılı hikâyelere konu oldu.
